  • Package cs213.photoAlbum.model

    • Class cs213.photoAlbum.model.Album extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • albumName

          java.lang.String albumName
          Name of the album.

        • photoList

          java.util.List<E> photoList
          List of photos contained in this album.

    • Class cs213.photoAlbum.model.Photo extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • fileName

          java.lang.String fileName
          Name of the file of this photo on the system. Uses its canonical path.

        • caption

          java.lang.String caption
          Caption for the photo.

        • date

          java.util.Calendar date
          Last modified date of the photo file.

        • locationTag

          Tag locationTag
          Location tag for the photo, if one exists.

        • personTagList

          java.util.List<E> personTagList
          List of tags of type "person".

        • otherTagList

          java.util.List<E> otherTagList
          List of tags that are not of type "location" or "person".

        • albumLocation

          java.util.List<E> albumLocation
          List of albums which this photo is in.

    • Class cs213.photoAlbum.model.Tag extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • tagString

          java.lang.String tagString
          user formatted input for identifying the tag (type:"value").

        • type

          java.lang.String type
          type of the tag.

        • value

          java.lang.String value
          value for the type of the tag.

        • photoList

          java.util.List<E> photoList
          List of photos that this tag is in.

    • Class cs213.photoAlbum.model.User extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • userID

          java.lang.String userID
          Identification for the user.

        • userName

          java.lang.String userName
          Full name of the user.

        • albumList

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> albumList
          Hash map of the user's albums.

        • photoList

          java.util.List<E> photoList
          List of the photos contained in any of the user's albums.

        • tagList

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> tagList
          Hash map of the tags contained in any of the user's photos.

          javax.swing.JButton addTags

          javax.swing.JButton removeTags
          remove a tag from the selected photo.

          move the selected photo to a different album.

        • photoPanel

          javax.swing.JScrollPane photoPanel
          Scrolling panel for the photoListPanel.

        • photoListPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel photoListPanel
